metadata.title: CVE-2022-3286 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Lack of IP address checking in GitLab EE affecting all versions from 14.2prior to 15.2.5, 15.3 prior to 15.3.4, and 15.4 prior to 15.4.1 allows agroup member to bypass IP restrictions when using a deploy token

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
